member.name: P:Mistaken.Updater.Config.AutoUpdateConfig.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets url used for auto updating. For GitLab it should be something like "https://gitlab.example.com/api/v4/projects/1/". For GitHub it should be something like "https://api.github.com/repos/example/repo/".

member.name: P:Mistaken.Updater.Config.AutoUpdateConfig.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets Auto Update type.

member.name: P:Mistaken.Updater.Config.AutoUpdateConfig.Token
member.summary: Gets or sets token used for authorization.

member.name: P:Mistaken.Updater.Config.AutoUpdateConfig.VerbouseOutput
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether auto updater's debugs should be visible.

member.summary: Download update from GitLab using artifacts

member.name: F:Mistaken.Updater.Config.AutoUpdateType.GITHUB_DEVELOPMENT
member.summary: Download update from GitHub using artifacts

member.name: T:Mistaken.Updater.Config.IAutoUpdatableConfig
